CaseRelatedFile.name: CaseRelatedFile
CaseRelatedFile.description: Represents the details of a file attached to a case, such as file properties, file processing details, and other additional relevant information.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the case related file.

ContentDocumentId.description: The content document associated with the case related file.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the case related file.

ProcessDefinitionReferenceId.description: The batch calc job definition associated with the case related file.

ProcessStatus.description: Specifies the current status of the case related file during processing.

SourceDatasetName.description: The name of the source dataset for processing.

TargetDatasetName.description: The name of the target data created through the transformation of the source dataset.
